name: boilerplate-front-end
description: Boilerplate project to use from when creating new projects.
author: Guillaume Becker <guillaume@plutusds.com>

scripts.export: rm -rf .next out && next build && next export
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run export && cp ./pages/404.html ./out/ && firebase use default && firebase deploy;
scripts.deploy-qa: mv .env staging.env && mv qa.env .env && npm run export && cp ./pages/404.html ./out/ && firebase use qa && firebase deploy && firebase use default && mv .env qa.env && mv staging.env .env
scripts.deploy-production: mv .env staging.env && mv production.env .env && npm run export && cp ./pages/404.html ./out/ && firebase use production && firebase deploy && firebase use default && mv .env production.env && mv staging.env .env
